Title: Autumn Cheesecake
Content: Hope you enjoy your Autumn Cheesecake.
META:
<META Name="Description" Content="Autumn Cheesecake will have you craving even more delicious cheesecakes recipes.Mm Mm Good.">
<META Name="Keywords" Content="Autumn Cheesecake,cheesecake,cheesecake recipe,dessert">
Ingredients:
• 1 cup graham cracker crumbs
  • 3 tablespoons granulated sugar
  • 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/4 cup margarine, melted
  • 16 ounces cream cheese, softened
  • 1/2 cup granulated sugar
  • 2 eggs
  • 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 4 cups thin peeled apple slices
  • 1/3 cup granulated sugar
  • 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/4 cup chopped pecans
Directions:
The Directions

Combine crumbs, 3 tablespoons sugar, cinnamon and margarine; press onto bottom of a 9-inch springform pan. Bake at 350 degrees F for 10 minutes.

Combine cream cheese and 1/2 cup sugar, mixing at medium speed of electric mixer until well blended. Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Blend in vanilla extract; pour over crust.

Toss apples with combined 1/3 cup sugar and cinnamon. Spoon apple mixture over cream cheese layer. Sprinkle with pecans. Bake at 350 degrees F for 1 hour and 10 minutes. Loosen cake from rim of pan; cool before removing rim of pan. Chill.

Variation Add 1/2 cup finely chopped pecans with crumbs for crust. Continue as directed.

Title: Granny Apple Cheesecake
Content: Hope you enjoy this delicious this tart and sweet Granny Apple Cheesecake.
META:
<META Name="Description" Content="Granny Apple Cheesecake will have you craving even more delicious cheesecakes recipes.Mm Mm Good.">
<META Name="Keywords" Content="Granny Apple Cheesecake,cheesecake,cheesecake recipe,dessert">
Ingredients:
• Crust
  • 1 1/4 cups graham cracker crumbs
  • 1/4 cup butter or margarine, melted
  • 2 tablespoons granulated sugar
  • 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon
  • Apple-Cheese Filling
  • 2 envelopes unflavored gelatine
  • 3/4 cup granulated sugar, divided
  • 1 cup low fat milk
  • 2 eggs, separated
  • 1 tablespoon lemon juice
  • 1/2 teaspoon grated lemon peel
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • 2 cups (1 pound) small curd cottage cheese
  • 2 large Granny Smith apples, pared, cored and shredded (2 cups)
Directions:
The Directions

In a small bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix well. Press firmly into a 9-inch springform pan, cover bottom and 1 1/4 inches up sides. Chill for 1 hour.

In a medium saucepan, combine gelatine with 1/2 cup sugar. Stir in milk, egg yolks, lemon juice, lemon peel and salt. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly with a wire whisk, until gelatine dissolves. Remove from heat.

In a large bowl, beat cottage cheese until smooth. Gradually beat in gelatine mixture. Stir in shredded apples. Chill, stirring occasionally, until mixture mounds slightly when dropped from a spoon.

In a small bowl, beat egg whites until foamy. Gradually add remaining 1/4 cup sugar, beating until stiff peaks form. Fold into apple-cheese mixture. Pour into prepared pan. Chill overnight or 8 to 12 hours until firm.

Title: Apple Crumb Cheesecake
Content: Apple crumb is usually associated with pies. If you take away the pie, keep the crumbs and add some cream cheese you get yourself one remarkable Apple Crumb Cheesecake recipe. It's simple to bake and even more fun to eat.
META:
<META Name="Description" Content="Check out this delicious Apple Crumb Cheesecake Recipe. You'll be delighted with this cheesecake rich and creamy taste sensation.  If everthing only tasted this great!!">
<META Name="Keywords" Content="Apple Crumb Cheesecake,apple crumb cheesecake recipe,cheesecake,cheesecake recipe,dessert">
Ingredients:
• Apple Crumb Cheesecake
  • The Ingredients
  • The Crust
  • 1 1/2 Graham Crackers crumbs
  • 1/2 cup Butter, melted
  • 2 tablespoons of light brown Sugar
  • The Filling
  • 3 8 ounce packages of Cream Cheese softened
  • 3 Eggs
  • 1/2 of Butter
  • 3/4 cup of Sugar
  • 1 teaspoons Vanilla Extract
  • 1 teaspoon ofCornstarch
  • 1/2 cup Whipped Cream
  • The Crumbs
  • 3/4 cup flour
  • 1/2 cup light brown sugar
  • 1/2 cup softened butter
  • 1 teaspoon of cinnamon
Directions:
The Directions

Combine Graham Crackers crumbs, melted butter and light brown sugar in medium size bowl. Press into the bottom and slightly up the sides of a 9" springform pan and place in refrigerator to harden.

Preheat Oven 350°F 15 to 30 minutes before baking. Slowly blend softened cream cheese into a large mixing bowl. Next add butter and cornstarch and continue to mix. Slowly add sugar and continue to mix well. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Add Whipped Cream and Vanilla Extract and continue to mix until well blended. Pour mixture in Crust.

For the crumbs, combine in a small bowl the flour, brown sugar, softened butter and cinnamon.  Mix until crumbly. Sprinkle over cheesecake mixture and cover completely.Bake for 45 minutes to an 1 hour. Sides should look somewhat dry when done. Turn off and crack the oven door. Leave in for 15 more minutes. Let cool on rack.

Chill in refrigerator for 2-3 hours or until the cheesecake has set. Enjoy your Apple Crumb Cheesecake.

Title: A Supremely Delicious Dutch Apple Cheesecake
Content: Hope you enjoy your A Supremely Delicious Dutch Apple Cheesecake.
META:
<META Name="Description" Content="Check out this delicious Dutch Apple Cheesecake. You’ll be delighted with it’s rich and creamy taste sensation.  If everthing only tasted this great!!">
<META Name="Keywords" Content="Dutch Apple Cheesecake,Dutch Apple Cheesecake recipe, cheesecake,cheesecake recipe,dessert">
Ingredients:
• Dutch Apple Cheesecake
  • The Ingredients
  • The Crust:
  • 20 Pecan sandies
  • 1/2 Cup chopped pecans
  • 2 Tablespoon very soft butter
  • Filling:
  • 3 (8-ounce) packages of softend Cream Cheese
  • 1 (14.5-ounce) can sweetened condensed milk
  • 1 Tablespoon of Cornstarch
  • 2 Teaspoonvanilla extract
  • 1 Teaspooncinnamon spice
  • 3 large eggs, room temperature
  • 1 can apple pie filling, or 1 1/2 cups of your own homemade.
  • Dutch Crumb Topping:
  • 3/4 cup packed brown sugar
  • 3/4 cup all-purpose flour
  • 1/3 cup butter, melted
  • 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon
  • 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg
Directions:
The Directions

Dutch Crumb Topping: Blend together brown sugar, flour, melted butter, ground cinnamon and ground nutmegin a medium-sized bowl until mixture is crumbly. Set aside to use at end of baking cycle.

Crust: Preheat Oven at 350°F Process sandies, chopped pecans and soft butter for crust in food processor until crumbs are nice and moist. Pat into a 9 inch springform pan. Bake in preheated 350°F oven for 8 - 10 minutes. Remove and cool on wire rack.

Filling: Preheat Oven at 350°F Place a pan with about 2-inches of water in bottom of oven, to create moist atmosphere. If necessary refill with hot water every 30 minutes during baking. In large mixing bowl, slowly mix softened cream and sweetened condensed milk. Add in cornstrach, vanilla extract and cinnamon spice and blend well. When well blended, add 3 large eggs, one at a time and continue to mix.

Pour into crust. Top with Apples from Pie Filling, placing apples in fan design around the cheesecake. You won't need a whole can. Save the rest for something else, it will freeze fine.

Bake for 35 minutes, pull from oven and sprinkle Dutch Crumb Toppingon top and pat well. Return to oven for 20 minutes.

Remove cheesecake and run knife round edges of cake to loosen. Turn off oven heat and return cheesecake to oven and crack door and let set one hour, to slowly start cool down. (This cooling method will help you bake a crack free cheesecake. )

Remove and finish cooling on wire rack. Chill for 3 hours then remove sides of springform pan.

Drizzle with caramel sauce of your choosing (like caramel ice cream topping) or just top with Cool Whip. Serve and enjoy your Dutch Apple Cheesecake.

Title: Apple Pie Cheesecake in a Ginger Crust
Content: Hope you enjoy your Apple Pie Cheesecake in a Ginger Crust.
META:
<META Name="Description" Content="Apple Pie Cheesecake in a Ginger Crust will have you craving even more delicious cheesecakes recipes.Mm Mm Good.">
<META Name="Keywords" Content="Apple Pie Cheesecake in a Ginger Crust,cheesecake,cheesecake recipe,dessert">
Ingredients:
• Crust
  • 10 ounces dry gingersnap cookies
  • 1/3 cup granulated sugar
  • 1/2 cup unsalted butter, melted
  • Filling
  • 3 tablespoons butter
  • 4 Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and roughly chopped
  • 3 Golden Delicious apples, peeled, cored and roughly chopped
  • 1/2 cup raisins
  • 16 ounces cream cheese, at room temperature
  • 4 eggs
  • 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk
  • 1/4 cup granulated sugar
  • 1/2 teaspoon allspice
  • 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/8 teaspoon nutmeg, freshly grated
Directions:
The Directions

For the crust: Pulse cookies, sugar and melted butter in a food processor to a uniform, mealy consistency. Press into a lightly greased 9-inch springform pan. Chill while making the filling.

Filling: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F.

Preheat a large skillet over medium heat. When hot, add the butter, apples and raisins. Stir frequently for 10 minutes.

In a food processor, purée the cream cheese, eggs, milk, sugar and spices. Transfer the mixture to a bowl and add the cooked apples. Stir to combine.

Pour the filling into the crust and bake until the centerof the cheesecake registers 150 degrees on an instant-read thermometer, about 40 to 45 minutes.

Cool on a rack for 1 hour before releasing the pan's spring and removing the collar. Cool another hour, then transfer to a serving plate.

Serve at room temperature or chilled.

Makes 8 to 10 servings.

Title: Apple Sauce Recipe
Content: A quick and easy apple sauce recipe.
META:
<META Name="Description" Content="An Apple Sauce Recipe that's sweet, tasty and easy to make. ">
<META Name="Keywords" Content="Apple Sauce Recipe,sauce,recipe,dessert">
Ingredients:
• 2 Medium Apples or enough to Make 1/2 Cup of Puree
  • 1 Cup of Apple Jelly
  • 1/2 Cup of Apricot Preserves
  • Tablespoon of Light Corn Syrup
  • 1 Tablespoon of Cornstarch
  • 1 Tablespoon of Cold Water
Directions:
The Directions

Using a food processor, puree your apples. In a large sauce pan, heat jelly, apricot preserves and corn syrup stirring until melted. Mix in apple puree. In a smal cup, dissolve corn starch in the cold water, then whisk into the glaze. Bring to a simmer and cook until mixture boils, thickens and turns clear- ~ 2 minutes.

Strain the glaze and drizzle over entire cheesecake or dessert. Enjoy Apple Sauce.

Title: Apple Normandy Cheesecake
Content: Hope you enjoy your Apple Normandy Cheesecake.
META:
<META Name="Description" Content="Apple Normandy Cheesecake will have you craving even more delicious cheesecakes recipes.Mm Mm Good.">
<META Name="Keywords" Content="Apple Normandy Cheesecake,cheesecake,cheesecake recipe,dessert">
Ingredients:
• Crust
  • 3 cups graham cracker crumbs
  • 1/2 cup (1 stick) melted butter
  • Filling
  • 32 ounces cream cheese (at room temperature)
  • 1 cup granulated sugar
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 4 eggs
  • 1/4 cup all-purpose flour
  • 3 teaspoons cinnamon
  • 2 tablespoons applejack brandy or 1/4 cup apple juice
  • 14 to 16 (1/4-inch) peeled apple slices
Directions:
The Directions

Preheat oven to 325F. In medium bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and butter; mix well to moisten. Press crumbs in bottom and 3/4 way up sides of 10-inch spring-form pan. Set aside.

In large bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and vanilla extract; mix at medium speed until well blended. Add eggs one at a time until of batter consistency. Add flour, cinnamon and brandy or apple juice; gently mix until combined. Pour into crust-lined pan. Bake for 1 hour. Fan apple slices on top of cheesecake; bake an additional 20 to 30 minutes or until center is set. Refrigerate overnight before serving.

Yields 14 to 16 servings.

Title: Apple Cinnamon Cheesecake
META:
<META Name="Description" Content="A Apple Cinnamon cheesecake treat. Simply Fantastic!!">
<META Name="Keywords" Content="Apple Cinnamon cheesecake,Apple Cinnamon cheesecake recipe,cheesecake,cheesecake recipe,dessert">
Ingredients:
• Apple Cinnamon Cheesecake Recipe
  • The Ingredients:
  • 1 1/2 Cups of Graham Crackers crumbs
  • 1/4 pound (1 Stick) of melted Butter
  • 1/4 Cup of Sugar
  • Teaspoon Vanilla Extract
  • 3 (8 ounce) bars of softened Cream Cheese
  • 1 1/4 Cup of Light Brown Sugar
  • 1/2 Cup of Apple Sauce
  • 1 Teaspoon Vanilla Extract
  • 1 Teaspoon Cinnamon Extract
  • 1/2 Teaspoon of Nutmeg
  • 3 Eggs
  • 1/2 Cup of Heavy Whipping Cream
  • 3 Tablespoons of Powdered Sugar
Directions:
The Directions

For the Crust: Make your Graham cracker cookie crumbs by using a food processor or simply place in a plastic bag and crush using a rolling pin. Mix Graham Crackers, melted butter, sugar and vanilla extract in a bowl. Spread in the bottom of a 9" springform pan and up 1 1/2 inch on the side. Place in freezer to harden.

For the Filling: Preheat Oven at 350°F. Using an electric mixer blend cream cheese on low speed in a mixing bowl. Use spatula to scrape sides and paddle of mixer. Add in the brown sugar slowly and continue to beat until creamy. Add in vanilla extract, nutmeg, cinnamon and apple sauce and mix until blended. Add in eggs one at a time and continue to mix a lowest speed until eggs are incorporated in the batter.

Pour the mixture into your crust and use offset spatula to help scoop out the batter. Bake for hour or until center jiggles and the top is slightly brown. Remove from oven and let cool on a wire rack. Place in the refrigerator and allow to set.

For the Topping: In a chilled-bowl, whip cream on medium-thip speed until soft peaks form. With the mixer still running, sprinkle sugar into cream and continue to whip until firm peaks form.

Title: Caramel Apple Cheesecake
Content: Hope you enjoy your Caramel Apple Cheesecake.
META:
<META Name="Description" Content="Caramel Apple Cheesecake will have you craving even more delicious cheesecakes recipes.Mm Mm Good.">
<META Name="Keywords" Content="Caramel Apple Cheesecake,cheesecake,cheesecake recipe,dessert">
Ingredients:
• 1 (21 ounce) can apple fruit filling, divided
  • 1 (9- or 10-inch) graham cracker crust
  • 16 ounces cream cheese, softened
  • 1/2 cup granulated sugar
  • 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 2 eggs
  • 1/2 cup caramel topping
  • 12 pecan halves plus
  • 2 tablespoons chopped pecans
Directions:
The Directions

Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.

Reserve 1/2 cup apple filling. Spoon remaining filling into crust. Beat together cream cheese, sugar and vanilla extract until smooth. Add eggs and beat well. Pour over apple filling. Bake 35 minutes or until center is set. Cool.

Mix reserved apple filling and caramel topping in a small saucepan. Heat about 1 minute. Arrange apple slices around outside edge of cheesecake. Spoon caramel sauce onto the cheesecake and spread evenly. Decorate with pecan halves around edge. Sprinkle with chopped pecans. Refrigerate until ready to serves.

Makes 8 to 12 servings.

Title: Carmel Apple Cheesecake
Content: Hope you enjoy your Carmel Apple Cheesecake.

<META Name="Description" Content="Carmel Apple Cheesecake and other tasty and delicious cheesecake recipes.">

Title: Apple Chutney Cheesecake
Content: Hope you enjoy your Apple Chutney Cheesecake.
META:
<META Name="Description" Content="A delicious Apple Chutney Cheesecake Recipe">
<META Name="Keywords" Content="Apple Chutney Cheesecake Recipe,Apple Chutney Cheesecake,cheesecake,cheesecake recipe,dessert">
Ingredients:
• Apple Chutney Cheesecake Recipe
  • The Ingredients
  • 1 1/2 Cups of Graham Crackers
  • 1/4 pound (1 Stick) of melted Butter
  • 1/4 Cup of Sugar
  • 4 (8 ounce) bar of softened Cream Cheese
  • 1 Cup Whipping Cream
  • 1 1/2 Cup of Sugar
  • 1/4 Cup of Apple Cider
  • 1 Teaspoon of Cinnamon
  • 1/4 Teaspoon of Ginger
  • 1 Teaspoon of of Vanilla Extract
  • 4 Eggs
  • 1 Cup of Cubed Apples
  • 2 Medium sliced Apples
  • 16 ounces of Cold Water
  • 1 Tablespoon of Lemon Juice
  • 1/2Whipping Cream
  • 2 Tablespoons of Confectioner's sugar
Directions:
The Directions

For the Crust: Make your Graham cracker crumbs by using a food processor or simply place in a plastic bag and crush using a rolling pin Mix Graham Cookie, sugar andmelted butter in a bowl. Spread in the bottom of a 9" springform pan and up 1 1/2 inch on the side and freeze.

For the Filling: Preheat Oven at 350°F.Using an electric mixer blend cream cheese on low speed in a mixing bowl. Use spatula to scrape sides and paddle of mixer.Add in the sugar slowly, and continue to beat until creamy.Add in apple cider, cinnamom, ginger and vanilla extract and continue to mix.Add in eggs one at a time and continue to mix a lowest speed until eggs are incorporated in the batter.Mix in whipping cream and then fold in apples.

Pour the mixture into your crust and use offset spatula to help scoop out the batter.Bake for 1 hour or until center jiggles and the top is slightly brown.Remove from oven and let cool on a wire rack.Place in the refrigerator and allow to set.

For the topping, slice apples and soak in a water and lemon juice.This keep the apples from browning.Mix whipping cream on medium-high speed until soft peaks form.While still mixing, add in sugar into cream and continue whipping until frim peaks form.Cover entire cake with topping.Place apples on top of topping.Serve and enjoy your Apple Chutney Cheesecake.

Title: Apple Pie Cheesecake
Content: Hope you enjoy your Apple Pie Cheesecake.
META:
<META Name="Description" Content="A Apple Pie cheesecake treat. Simply Fantastic!!">
<META Name="Keywords" Content="Apple Pie cheesecake,Apple Pie cheesecake recipe,cheesecake,cheesecake recipe,dessert">
Ingredients:
• Apple Pie Cheesecake Recipe
  • The Ingredients:
  • 1 1/2 Cups of Graham Crackers crumbs
  • 1/4 pound (1 Stick) of melted Butter
  • 1/4 Cup of Sugar
  • Teaspoon Vanilla Extract
  • 3 (8 ounce) bars of softened Cream Cheese
  • 1 Cup of Sugar
  • 1/4 Cup Honey Molasses
  • 1 Teaspoon Vanilla Extract
  • 1 Teaspoon Cinnamon Extract
  • 1 Tablespoon of Lemon Juice
  • 3 Eggs
  • 2 Medium Apples or enough to Make 1/2 Cup of Puree
  • 1 Cup of Apple Jelly
  • 1/2 Cup of Apricot Preserves
  • Tablespoon of Light Corn Syrup
  • 1 Tablespoon of Cornstarch
  • 1 Tablespoon of Cold Water
Directions:
The Directions

For the Crust: Make your Graham cracker cookie crumbs by using a food processor or simply place in a plastic bag and crush using a rolling pin. Mix Graham Crackers, melted butter, sugar and vanilla extract in a bowl. Spread in the bottom of a 9" springform pan and up 1 1/2 inch on the side. Place in freezer to harden.

For the Filling: Preheat Oven at 350°F. Using an electric mixer blend cream cheese on low speed in a mixing bowl. Use spatula to scrape sides and paddle of mixer. Add in the sugar and molasses slowly, and continue to beat until creamy. Add in vanilla extract, lemon juice and cinnamon and mix until blended. Add in eggs one at a time and continue to mix a lowest speed until eggs are incorporated in the batter.

Pour the mixture into your crust and use offset spatula to help scoop out the batter. Bake for hour or until center jiggles and the top is slightly brown. Remove from oven and let cool on a wire rack.

For the Topping: Using a food processor, puree your apples. In a large sauce pan, heat jelly, apricot preserves and corn syrup stirring until melted. Mix in apple puree. In a smal cup, dissolve corn starch in the cold water, then whisk into the glaze. Bring to a simmer and cook until mixture boils, thickens and turns clear- ~ 2 minutes. Strain the glaze and drizzle over entire cheesecake. As as side note: Sprinkling chopped almonds on top of glaze also adds a nice touch. Cover pan with plastic making sure not to touch the glaze. Refigerate until cheesecake and glaze has set. Serve and enjoy your Apple Pie Cheesecake.

Title: Tortilla Apple Cheesecake
Content: Hope you enjoy your Tortilla Apple Cheesecake.
META:
<META Name="Description" Content="Tortilla Apple Cheesecake will have you craving even more delicious cheesecakes recipes.Mm Mm Good.">
<META Name="Keywords" Content="Tortilla Apple Cheesecake,cheesecake,cheesecake recipe,dessert">
Ingredients:
• 2 (9-inch) flour tortillas
  • 1/4 cup granulated sugar
  • 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 3 ounces cream cheese, softened
  • 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1/3 cup finely chopped, peeled apple Oil for frying Vanilla ice cream (optional) Caramel topping (optional)
Directions:
The Directions

Serves 2.

Let tortillas stand at room temperature while making filling.

Mix sugar and cinnamon and set aside.

Using a fork, mash cream cheese with vanilla extract, stirring until smooth. Stir in apple. Spoon filling down centers of tortillas, leaving 1 1/2 inches at top and bottom. To enclose filling, fold top and bottom onto cream cheese; roll up.

Heat oil over medium heat in skillet about 1/2 inch deep. Fry tortillas on both sides until golden. Turn out onto paper towel and immediately into cinnamon sugar.

Serve plain or with ice cream and topping.

Title: Cranberry Apple Cheesecake
Content: Hope you enjoy your Cranberry Apple Cheesecake.
META:
<META Name="Description" Content="A delicious Cranberry Apple Cheesecake Recipe">
<META Name="Keywords" Content="Cranberry Apple Cheesecake Recipe,Cranberry Apple Cheesecake,cheesecake,cheesecake recipe,dessert">
Ingredients:
• Cranberry Apple Cheesecake Recipe
  • The Ingredients
  • 1 1/2 Cups of Graham Crackers
  • 1/4 pound (1 Stick) of melted Butter
  • 1/4 Cup of Sugar
  • 3 (8 ounce) bar of softened Cream Cheese
  • 1 1/2 Cup of Sugar
  • 1/4 Cup of Flour
  • 1 Teaspoon of Cinnamon
  • 1/2 Teaspoon of Nutmeg
  • 1 Teaspoon of of Vanilla Extract
  • 3 Eggs
  • 1/2 Cup Coarsely Chopped Cranberries
  • 2 Fuji Apples, peeled and grated
  • 1 can (15 ounce) of Apple Pie Filling
Directions:
The Directions

For the Crust: Make your Graham cracker crumbs by using a food processor or simply place in a plastic bag and crush using a rolling pin. Mix Graham Cookie, sugar andmelted butter in a bowl. Spread in the bottom of a 9" springform pan and up 1 1/2 inch on the side and freeze.

For the Filling: Preheat Oven at 350°F Using an electric mixer blend cream cheese on low speed in a mixing bowl. Use spatula to scrape sides and paddle of mixer. Add in the sugar slowly, and continue to beat until creamy. Add in flour, cinnamom, nutmeg, and vanilla extract and continue to mix. Add in eggs one at a time and continue to mix a lowest speed until eggs are incorporated in the batter. Fold in cranberries and apples.

Pour the mixture into your crust and use offset spatula to scoop out the batter. Bake for 1 hour or until center jiggles and the top is slightly brown. Remove from oven and let cool on a wire rack. Place in the refrigerator and allow to set.

For the Topping: Cover entire cheesecake with apple pie filling. Serve and enjoy your Cranberry Apple Cheesecake.

Title: Applesauce Cheesecake
Content: Hope you enjoy your Applesauce Cheesecake.
META:
<META Name="Description" Content="Applesauce Cheesecake will have you craving even more delicious cheesecakes recipes.Mm Mm Good.">
<META Name="Keywords" Content="Applesauce Cheesecake,cheesecake,cheesecake recipe,dessert">
Ingredients:
• Crust
  • 1 1/4 cups graham cracker crumbs (about 20 squares)
  • 1/2 cup chopped pecans, toasted
  • 1/4 cup firmly packed brown sugar
  • 1/4 cup margarine, melted
  • Filling
  • 24 ounces cream cheese, softened
  • 1 cup granulated sugar
  • 2 tablespoons flour
  • 3 eggs
  • 1 cup applesauce
  • 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/8 teaspoon nutmeg
Directions:
The Directions

Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.

In medium bowl, combine all crust ingredients; mix well. Press onto bottom of ungreased 10-inch springform pan.

In a large bowl, beat cream cheese and sugar at medium speed until smooth and creamy. Add flour; blend well. At low speed, add eggs, one at a time, beating just until blended. Add remaining ingredients. Beat until well blended. Pour into crust-lined pan. Bake at 350 degrees F for 50 to 60 minutes or until center is set. Cool.

Refrigerate several hours or overnight. Just before serving, carefully remove sides of pan. Store in refrigerator.

Yields 16 servings.
